  <a href="https://www.gatsbyjs.org"/>

<h1 align="center">
  A jewellery design portfolio for Porntip Kanok
</h1>

## Page index

1. **Home**

    - A brief carousell gallery of key pictures

2. **About** 

    - Philosophy & journey
    - Guiding principles 

3. **Shop** 

    - Carousells categorized by type of jewellery 
    - Each carousell to link to an expanded page for that type 

4. **Custom-made** 

    - Galleries of unique pieces commissioned, with a more artistic frame 
    - Contact form 



## Product class & image file structure

    Product data in `products.json` 

    Each product will contain: 
    - Several images (labelled "ring1.1, ring1.2, etc")
    - Pricing 
    - Product code
    - Description
    - Availability

    Images will be organized in files according to type. 
    eg. Ring images will be `images/rings/ring1.1.jpg`

    





[![Deploy to Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/img/deploy/button.svg)](https://app.netlify.com/start/deploy?repository=https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default)
